movie.title: The Tenants Downstairs
movie.description_intro: A loafer inherits an apartment block and lets out the place to a group of tenants, including a lusty gymnastics teacher, a geeky college student, a single father with his young daughter, a gay couple, a writer and a sexy female office worker. An incredible story is about to unfold as they start their lives in the same building.
movie.description_full: A loafer inherits an apartment block and lets out the place to a group of tenants, including a lusty gymnastics teacher, a geeky college student, a single father with his young daughter, a gay couple, a writer and a sexy female office worker. An incredible story is about to unfold as they start their lives in the same building.

movies.title: Night Visitor
movies.summary: A student known for telling stories witnesses a murder, the latest in a series of satanic killings of hookers.
movies.description_full: A student known for telling stories witnesses a murder, the latest in a series of satanic killings of hookers.
movies.synopsis: A student known for telling stories witnesses a murder, the latest in a series of satanic killings of hookers.

movies.title: Dogman
movies.summary: Marcello, a small and gentle dog groomer, finds himself involved in a dangerous relationship of subjugation with Simone, a former violent boxer who terrorizes the entire neighborhood. In an effort to reaffirm his dignity, Marcello will submit to an unexpected act of vengeance.
movies.description_full: Marcello, a small and gentle dog groomer, finds himself involved in a dangerous relationship of subjugation with Simone, a former violent boxer who terrorizes the entire neighborhood. In an effort to reaffirm his dignity, Marcello will submit to an unexpected act of vengeance.

movies.title: Death Wish
movies.summary: Dr. Paul Kersey (Bruce Willis) is a surgeon who only sees the aftermath of his city's violence as it's rushed into his ER -until his wife (Elisabeth Shue) and college-age daughter (Camila Morrone) are viciously attacked in their suburban home. With the police overloaded with crimes, Paul, burning for revenge, hunts for his family's assailants to deliver justice. As the anonymous slayings of criminals grabs the media's attention, the city wonders if this deadly avenger is a guardian angel...or a grim reaper. Fury and fate collide in the intense action-thriller Death Wish.

movies.title: Halahal
movies.summary: The murder of a medical college girl morphed into a suicide takes Dr. Shiv Sharma (father of the girl) on a journey to dig the truth out of his daughter's murder, with the help of a corrupt police officer, Yusuf. He realises that it is not a normal murder case but instead, there is a scam going on behind all this where students are being killed to hide the truth from the world. Eventually, Dr. Shiv finds out that his daughter was also one of the conspirators of the scam. Will he expose the scam to the world along with his daughter? Or will he hide the facts from the world? Will it be a life changing case for Yusuf to make money from Dr. Shiv in return for his help?
